142.content:
JD sat on his couch sorting through mail. One specific envelope caught his eye. It read: "You have been randomly selected for the Ultimate Endurance Test! Come to 123 Derp Street to participate!"

"Hmm, I do love shiny medals. I'll do it!" He said triumphantly, running out of his apartment and down the street.

An attractive woman met him at the door. "Hello, my name is Dr. Lisa Cuddy. Come with me." she said, leading him into a small room with a chair in it.

"Please, sit. I need to inject a small amount of medicine in you to cure any infections."

JD shifted uncomfortably. "Uh, are you sure this is necessary?"

"Yes. It won't hurt a bit. Just sit still and let it take effect." She reassured him, injecting the green liquid into his arm.

"I'm starting to feel tired, is that normal?" JD said, straining to keep his eyes open.

"Oh, yes. It will only last a few minutes." Cuddy said, but JD was already sleeping. She smiled as he began shrinking.

JD awoke with a shock. He was in a pool of cold water. "Hey, where am I? Oh, this must be one of the tests! Bring it on, sharks!" He exclaimed, searching the water.

Suddenly everything got dark. "Hey, who turned off the lights?" He asked, looking up.

"That worked faster than I expected. Have fun, little guy." JD recognized the voice as Cuddy's.

"Dr. Cuddy? Is that you? What happened to me?" He yelled.

"I shrunk you. It's all part of the test." She said.

She then..

info.brief_description:
A Scrubs shrinking story following JD as he faces the female cast,
with HOUSE crossovers
info.description:
This story will be taken place at Sacred Heart Hospital, but may also have a change of setting (i.e. she took him to her house).
The story is based around JD, a young doctor who is faced with many problems when he is shrunk down during work.

Rules
No Male characters other than JD may be present. (Sorry boys I don't swing that way)
Please have decent grammer (It doesn't have to be perfect but please make an effort, if its to hard to read I will have to delete or revise it).

So now lets introduce the most well known female characters from scrubs:

Elliot: http://www.tvfanatic.com/images/gallery/sarah-chalke-as-elliot-reed.jpg

Carla: http://images.tvnz.co.nz/tvnz_images/tv2/programmes/scrubs/photogalleries/Cast/c...

Jordan: http://www.drawingtheline.net/images/jordan.jpg

Those are the primary characters, but I will have extra character slots for the purpose of adding guest stars in. If you do add a character please include a link to a picture (not required but recommended).
I prefer death scenes but please include an opening to keep the story going (i.e. a living option). And I prefer vore, ass, digestion, no digestion, and toilet. Please feel free to use other methods, and try to keep it unaware but it does not have to stay unaware.
With that please enjoy and please add I really wont delete much.
dditions.
NOTE: If you add to my story then you may request for me to add to yours by email.

NEWS: I am now allowing Female characters from HOUSE to crossover into Sacred Heart. So please enjoy and once again please add to keep this story alive.
